headline.print_headline: Lloyds Bank Braced for Questions Over Chief Executive's Pay
headline.main: Lloyds Bank Braced for Questions Over Chief Executive's Pay

docs.snippet: State-backed Lloyds Banking Group is braced for tough questions from shareholders at its annual meeting on Thursday over a 7.8 million pound ($13.1 million) pay package handed to Chief Executive Antonio Horta-Osorio....
docs.lead_paragraph: State-backed Lloyds Banking Group is braced for tough questions from shareholders at its annual meeting on Thursday over a 7.8 million pound ($13.1 million) pay package handed to Chief Executive Antonio Horta-Osorio.

headline.print_headline: Defendant Called 911 Repeatedly About Slain Dancer
headline.main: Defendant Called 911 Repeatedly About Slain Dancer

docs.snippet: A Las Vegas Strip dancer testified Wednesday that he made multiple 911 calls, but police didn't take seriously his complaints that he was being harassed and sometimes attacked by the ex-girlfriend he's charged with killing and dismembering in Dece...
docs.lead_paragraph: A Las Vegas Strip dancer testified Wednesday that he made multiple 911 calls, but police didn't take seriously his complaints that he was being harassed and sometimes attacked by the ex-girlfriend he's charged with killing and dismembering in December 2010.

headline.print_headline: Allianz Taking $30 Million Hit on Malaysia Airlines Plane Loss-CFO
headline.main: Allianz Taking $30 Million Hit on Malaysia Airlines Plane Loss-CFO

docs.snippet: Allianz has taken a $30 million (17.88 million pounds) hit, or about 9 percent of the insured market loss, on the Malaysia Airlines plane that disappeared in March, the German insurer said on Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Allianz has taken a $30 million (17.88 million pounds) hit, or about 9 percent of the insured market loss, on the Malaysia Airlines plane that disappeared in March, the German insurer said on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Two Sick U.S. Hospital Workers Test Negative for MERS Virus
headline.main: Two Sick U.S. Hospital Workers Test Negative for MERS Virus

docs.snippet: Two U.S. hospital workers who fell ill after contact with a patient suffering from Middle East Respiratory Syndrome (MERS) have tested negative for the often-deadly virus, a Florida health official said on Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Two U.S. hospital workers who fell ill after contact with a patient suffering from Middle East Respiratory Syndrome (MERS) have tested negative for the often-deadly virus, a Florida health official said on Wednesday.

headline.main: Video Message From Jailed Egyptian Journalist

docs.snippet: Al Jazeera released a brief video message from its detained West Africa correspondent, Abdullah Elshamy, recorded on the 106th day of his hunger strike in an Egyptian jail....
docs.abstract: Al Jazeera released a brief video message from its detained West Africa correspondent, Abdullah Elshamy, recorded on the 106th day of his hunger strike in an Egyptian jail.

headline.main: Q & A: Leta Hong Fincher on 'Leftover Women'

docs.snippet: In her new book, Leta Hong Fincher argues that gender inequality is growing in China and identifies a key area where that can be seen — property ownership....
docs.abstract: In her new book, Leta Hong Fincher argues that gender inequality is growing in China and identifies a key area where that can be seen — property ownership.

headline.print_headline: FBI: Drunken Passenger Gropes 3 on UK-Bound Flight
headline.main: FBI: Drunken Passenger Gropes 3 on UK-Bound Flight

docs.snippet: A drunken, unruly airline passenger groped three women before air marshals arrested him and the London-bound plane turned back to Philadelphia, according to court documents....
docs.lead_paragraph: A drunken, unruly airline passenger groped three women before air marshals arrested him and the London-bound plane turned back to Philadelphia, according to court documents.

headline.print_headline: US Congressman's Son Arrested on Drug Charge
headline.main: US Congressman's Son Arrested on Drug Charge

docs.snippet: The son of Republican U.S. Rep. Paul Broun has been arrested on marijuana possession charges in Georgia....
docs.lead_paragraph: The son of Republican U.S. Rep. Paul Broun has been arrested on marijuana possession charges in Georgia.
